prompts.title: Bioluminescent Winter Macro
prompts.description: Ethereal plants with glowing veins trapped in ice
prompts.prompt: Macro shot of a winter rose encased in a thick layer of clear ice, bioluminescent blue and violet veins glowing softly from within the petals, dark moody background, ethereal lighting, high-detail frost textures, 8k resolution.
prompts.trendContext: The 'Glowing Nature' trend replacing traditional winter scenes for 2026.

prompts.title: Analogue Soul / Light Leak
prompts.description: Intentional film imperfections for an authentic human feel
prompts.prompt: Candid 35mm film photo of a person laughing at a New Year's dinner, heavy film grain, warm orange light leaks, slight motion blur, scanner dust textures, nostalgic 90s color palette, raw and unpolished aesthetic.
prompts.trendContext: The 2026 'Anti-AI' look—using AI to mimic flawed, real-life photography.

prompts.title: 2026 Vision Iris Reflection
prompts.description: Macro eye photography reflecting celebratory fireworks
prompts.prompt: Extreme close-up of a human eye, the iris reflecting a massive burst of gold and magenta 2026 fireworks, sharp eyelash detail, wet surface reflections, cinematic depth of field, vibrant celebratory mood.
prompts.trendContext: Viral 'Vision of the Future' profile picture trend for January 1st.

prompts.title: Ghibli-fied Winter City
prompts.description: Cozy, hand-painted anime aesthetic for urban landscapes
prompts.prompt: A quiet snowy street in Tokyo at dusk, glowing warm shop windows, hand-painted anime style, Studio Ghibli aesthetic, soft watercolor textures, vibrant blues and cozy oranges, nostalgic atmosphere.
prompts.trendContext: High demand for 'Lo-fi' winter backgrounds and aesthetic reels.

prompts.title: Origami Arctic Wildlife
prompts.description: Minimalist paper-craft animals in high-end studio settings
prompts.prompt: A majestic polar bear made of intricate white and silver folded origami paper, standing on a dark obsidian surface, sharp geometric shadows, soft side-lighting, elegant minimalism, 3D paper texture.
prompts.trendContext: The 'Texture Check' trend moving toward clean, geometric paper art.

prompts.title: Melting Golden Architecture
prompts.description: Famous landmarks melting like wax under a sunset
prompts.prompt: The Eiffel Tower slowly melting like gold wax under a deep crimson sunset, surrealist style inspired by Salvador Dalí, liquid metallic textures, painterly brushstrokes, dreamy and bizarre atmosphere.
prompts.trendContext: Emerging 'Liquid Reality' trend in digital art communities.

prompts.title: Cyber-Saree / Future Heritage
prompts.description: Traditional clothing meets fiber-optic neon tech
prompts.prompt: A woman in a traditional silk saree with integrated glowing fiber-optic threads, neon teal and violet light, futuristic Mumbai street background, rainy night with reflections, cinematic bokeh, high-tech fashion.
prompts.trendContext: The 'Future Heritage' trend popular in South Asian tech and fashion hubs.

prompts.title: Puffy 3D Typography '2026'
prompts.description: Inflated, soft-touch lettering for New Year branding
prompts.prompt: The numbers '2026' as giant, puffy, matte-finish 3D bubble letters, soft pastel gradients, studio lighting with gentle shadows, looking like inflated vinyl or soft silicone, minimalist white background.
prompts.trendContext: Dominant graphic design trend for 2026 social media posters.

prompts.title: Notes App Chic Collage
prompts.description: A messy, authentic scrapbook of 'digital life'
prompts.prompt: A digital collage featuring a raw smartphone photo of a coffee cup, a 'Notes App' checklist, and hand-drawn scribbles, overlapping textures, lo-fi aesthetic, realistic shadows, authentic 'day-in-the-life' vibe.
prompts.trendContext: Move toward 'Raw Honesty' and unpolished visuals in 2026 storytelling.

prompts.title: Bioluminescent Jellyfish Gown
prompts.description: Underwater high-fashion with glowing organic textures
prompts.prompt: A high-fashion editorial shot of a model wearing a gown made of glowing jellyfish tentacles, underwater ballroom setting, iridescent shimmer, soft blue and pink light, cinematic water physics, ethereal beauty.
prompts.trendContext: Nature-organic fusion dominating high-end AI fashion art.

prompts.title: Technical Mono / Code Brutalism
prompts.description: Monospaced fonts and terminal-style interfaces
prompts.prompt: A futuristic computer interface with monospaced green typography on a black background, code brutalism style, high contrast, scanning line textures, retro-computing aesthetics, technical and raw.
prompts.trendContext: Vibe coding aesthetic where code becomes the visual playground.

prompts.title: Glass Christmas Tree Ornament
prompts.description: Turning characters into glass-blown ornaments
prompts.prompt: A hyper-detailed glass-blown ornament of a [SUBJECT] hanging on a Christmas tree. Reflective glass surface, warm holiday lights bokeh, metallic silver cap, macro photography, high-shine finish.
prompts.trendContext: Viral 'Personalized Ornament' trend for December gift-giving.

prompts.title: Surveillance Dystopia / CCTV
prompts.description: Grainy security footage with a mysterious element
prompts.prompt: Grainy green-tinted night-vision CCTV footage of a snowy driveway, a tall mysterious glowing figure partially visible, date stamp 'JAN 01 2026' in the corner, pixelated texture, high-tension atmosphere.
prompts.trendContext: Converting digital-age anxiety into avant-garde design.

prompts.title: Four Seasons Timelapse Street
prompts.description: One image showing a year's transition across a city
prompts.prompt: A wide cinematic shot of a city street corner divided into four sections showing the transition from Winter snow to Spring blossoms to Summer sun to Autumn leaves, seamless blend, hyper-detailed, poetic composition.
prompts.trendContext: The 'Reflecting on Time' trend common for New Year's Day.

prompts.title: Liquid Glass Interface
prompts.description: Smooth, translucent UI elements with liquid movement
prompts.prompt: Floating 3D UI elements made of liquid glass, soft blue and teal gradients, translucent layers, smooth rounded edges, glossy finish, 'Frutiger Aero' revival style, hyper-realistic texture.
prompts.trendContext: The 'Texture Check' trend moving into glassy, tactile UI design.

prompts.title: Y3K Hyperfuturism Chrome
prompts.description: Liquid metal and silver-heavy future fashion
prompts.prompt: A model in a liquid chrome outfit standing in a dark void, metallic 'Future Dust' violet reflections, sharp geometric shadows, Y3K aesthetic, high-shine surfaces, 32k resolution.
prompts.trendContext: 2026's 'Color of the Year' Future Dust (deep violet-blue) trend.

prompts.title: Cozy 16-bit Winter Pixel Art
prompts.description: High-fidelity retro game style winter cabin
prompts.prompt: A cozy log cabin in a snowstorm, 16-bit pixel art style, smoke rising from chimney, warm yellow light from windows, purple night sky, nostalgic and charming, high-resolution pixel art.
prompts.trendContext: Popular for 'Lo-fi' study stream backgrounds and niche gaming profiles.

prompts.title: Abstract Floral X-Ray
prompts.description: Scientific yet poetic view of plant life
prompts.prompt: An x-ray style image of a blooming orchid, petals glowing softly with bioluminescent veins, dark indigo background, ethereal lighting, ultra-detailed macro photography, scientific and artistic blend.
prompts.trendContext: The 'Dreamy Botanical' trend for high-end home decor art.

prompts.title: The 'Boxed Icon' Figurine
prompts.description: Subjects as collectible retail action figures
prompts.prompt: A 3D collectible figurine of a [SUBJECT] inside a vintage plastic toy box with a glossy backing card, 'NANO BANANA' logo, studio lighting on plastic surfaces, retail packaging aesthetic, professional render.
prompts.trendContext: The 'Nano Banana' trend turning users into retail toy products.

prompts.title: Ice Sculpture Wildlife
prompts.description: Animals carved from transparent, glowing ice
prompts.prompt: A life-sized wolf carved from crystal-clear ice standing in a frozen clearing, internal light making the ice glow with a soft amber hue, hyper-realistic frozen textures, cinematic winter lighting.
prompts.trendContext: Viral 'Frost Art' trend for mid-winter social posts.
